SEARCH
Package Collision

Class Quadtree

java.lang.Object
Collision.Quadtree
public class Quadtree extends Object
Quad tree that is used to find objects that intersect in a more efficient way then doing a for loop of every item but still less efficient than a grid system.

  • Method Details

    • get_bounds

      public Rectangle get_bounds()

    • clear

      public void clear()

    • split

      public void split()
      Split the quad bound into four equal parts.

    • insert

      public void insert(GameObject gObject)
      Is being used in Game model inserts an object to the quad, if the object is outside the boundaries, it will try to insert to the parent node. if children nodes does not exist, it will just be added to this quad. if children nodes exist, it will be inserted to the children that intersect with it.

    • retrieve_objects_in_vicinity

      public ArrayList<GameObject> retrieve_objects_in_vicinity(Rectangle searchArea)
      retrieves all the objects that exist within the quad the rectangle belongs to.

    • update_object

      public void update_object(GameObject gameObject)
      Updates the quads references belonging to a specific game object.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - object quad refrences to update.

    • all_rect

      public ArrayList<Rectangle> all_rect()
      get all game objects rect that exist within this quad and it children

    • remove

      public void remove(GameObject ob)
      removes the game object from the quad. Happens when an object get deleted.
